description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              •	Analyzing customer data, brainstorming to work out the business logistics solution & proposal.
              
              •	Managing solution design deliverables across highly-complex customer projects.
              
              •	Contacting & negotiating with suppliers for competitive price and better terms & conditions for the tender.
              
              •	Do the costing and cash flow analysis for the whole life of the project.
              
              •	Presenting & convincing the management board on the proposal & the revenue & profit of the project.
              
              •	Together with Sales Team to communicate & discuss with customer on the proposal to reach the final agreement.
              
              •	Processing Business Case submission to the BOD/P&L owner to get approval before implementation.
              
              •	Cooperating with functional departments to set up & implement the new project.
              
              •	To support the finance & account department in billing process and evaluate the business operation.
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              •	Bachelor Degree in Business or related field, preferably in contract logistics or Supply Chain.
              
              •	Analytical skills (comparative analysis via spreadsheet).
              
              •	Expert level knowledge of MS Excel is a must.
              
              •	Knowledge of Warehouse & Transport Operations & Design.
              
              •	Exposure of working on warehouse/Network design tools like CLASS, AutoCAD, Microsoft Visio, SketchUp, 3Dmax, etc. is preferable.
              
              •	Ability to communicate effectively with customers.
              
              •	Developing the pre-Solution: Solution Design Profiling, Solution Benchmarking.
              
              •	Institutionalize and operationalize analytics function.
              
              •	Ability to lead/support implementation of new logistics concepts and cost savings initiatives.
              
              •	2+ years logistics industry experience or 2+ years analyst/engineering experience (preferred).
             

              Xem toàn bộ Yêu Cầu Công Việc
